name: PresidentHunterTalks
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: president hunter talks
des: Select talks from Howard W. Hunter, 14th President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Talks include 'Exceeding Great and Precious Promises', 'Being a Righteous Husband and Father', 'Follow the Son of God', 'Stand Firm in the Faith', 'What Manner of Men Ought Ye to Be?', 'Jesus, the Very Thought of Thee', 'The Beacon in the Harbor of Peace' and 'To the Women of the Church'.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
